title: Unlocking Human Potential: The World's Most Undervalued Asset
description:
Today it's time for me to explain myself and discuss one of the most critical yet overlooked topics in economics and the world in general, how individuals are the most undervalued asset in the world. I'll talk about the flaws within our current economic structure, how business analysis falls short and just perpetuates the the status quo, and discuss how we can transition to more abundant systems.

Check them out: https://engineeringgenerosity.com
